ProjectTitle: An attoscale stopped-flow device for the measurement of ensemble and single-molecule kinetics
InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/06/2024
Data: will you use samples/materials? These are considered physical data in the context of a DMP, please list these the table as well and describe how you document, store and preserve these
Storage/Preservation: it is more safe and secure to use a KU Leuven recommended storage solution, the storage guide can help you choose: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en; also note that part of the second paragraph is missing on page 10. 
Responsibilities: Normally the supervisor is responsible for the data preservation and sharing after the end of the PhD project.
label: good with suggestions
